Text: Re Confidentiality Agreement Cc propose the following document for proprietary information If you have any comments please contact Ken Wong at or I will only be available by email until Thursday morning Thanks Richard Dix See attached file Proprietary Infoenrondoc Proprietary Infoenrondoc

Re Confidentiality Agreement Cc the comments I am currently in Europe If you could contact Ken directly I would appreciate it Thanks Richard on PM To Richard M cc Kenneth M Subject Re Confidentiality Agreement Richard Thanks so much for providing the below document While I appreciate its simplicity it does not fully satisfy Enrons requirements If it is not too much trouble could you or Kenneth please provide comments to the agreement provided I will be back in my office on Wednesday and can address matters directly with Kenneth or you at that time Mark Senior Counsel ENA Phone Facsimile EMail richard mcom To cc AM Subject Re Confidentiality Agreement We would propose the following document for proprietary information If you have any comments please contact Ken Wong at or I will only be available by email until Thursday morning Thanks Richard Dix See attached file Proprietary Infoenrondoc See attached file Proprietary Infoenrondoc Proprietary Infoenrondoc
Re Confidentiality Agreement Cc provided comments to your NDA Please review and if acceptable forward documents for signature Thanks Richard See attached file NDAenronvdoc NDAenronvdoc
